drops.name: Tattered moon page
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Husky|url=https://twitter.com/JagexHusky/status/1156844944369377286|date=1 August 2019|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/h8aa9|archivedate=1 August 2019|quote=For those interested, here are the drop-rates for the unique items within the Forthos Dungeon.[https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA3wV4DW4AAVtos?format=jpg&name=small]|name=Forthos Dungeon Droprates}} <ref name="forthos" group="d">Tattered pages and grubby keys are only dropped by those found in the [[Forthos Dungeon]].</ref> <ref name="page" group="d">The drop rate to receive any tattered page is 1/25. When rolled, the player will receive the page they have the fewest of.</ref>

drops.name: Brimstone key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Only dropped if killed on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Konar quo Maten]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/1083783815141707781|author=Mod Kieren|date=16 January 2019|quote=0.2*(CBLEVEL - 100)^2 + 100}}
